name: Bunch 'o Ballooney!
description:
Welcome To Bunch 'O Ballooney!

Swing your hammer and whack balloons out of your way as you inflate them more and more! beware, though, as when they reach the top, they pop and come plummeting back down! score points by smashing the purple cushion to inflate the balloons more, but watch out because now the dangers have expanded as well! make sure you hit it hard enough, though or you will get bounced into the air! Keep alert and have fun in Bunch 'O Ballooney!

made for the Monthly Scratch Jam #2

-----------INSTRUCTIONS:------------- -WASD to move

-arrow keys to use hammer

-------------  TIPS:---------------

*balloons will not hurt you before they pop, but don't get hit by the pieces of rubber! (don't ask me why, I flunked clown school.)*

*Hit the cushion on the ground with your hammer to gain points! also balloons will get bigger and more dangerous, so watch out*

*if you don't hit the cushion hard enough, it will launch you into the air! (also likely towards rubber bits, so don't do that)*

P.S. My most sincerest apologies for the name, but the game is about clowns, so it works and I'm not changing it.

 - Soundrack, art, and Code 100% by me.

 - Created using Scratch for the Monthly Scratch Game Jam #2: https://itch.io/jam/monthly-scratch-jam-2

 - Follow me on Scratch, or check out the game there: 

https://scratch.mit.edu/users/Stray123/

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/742754601/

#GameJam #clown #circus #balloons #funny #bunchoballooney #games #art #music #other #notananimation #*neverGonnaGiveYouUpNeverGonnaLetYouDown*
